title: Healthcare Careers Fundamentals

options.text: It helps develop the next generation of skilled professionals.

title: Science & Research Careers

options.text: Explaining complex terms clearly in simple language
Avoiding patient questions to save time
Using technical jargon to appear more knowledgeable

options.text: It helps them learn best practices and develop their skills.
It reduces the workload for senior scientists.
It eliminates the need for formal training programs.
Mentors can complete junior scientists' tasks for them.

options.text: Developing new drugs to treat diseases

To improve communication within the team

By avoiding collaboration with other teams

To eliminate the need for safety equipment

questions.question_text: What strategic decision can a biotechnologist make to increase their earning potential?

options.text: Pursuing an advanced degree in biotechnology or a related field
